subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: At 69, Jackson is a rookie front office guy, unquestionably a power hire yet a member of the Knicks owner James L. Dolan’s team, with all that suggests and ultimately will mean.
snippet: At 69, Jackson is a rookie front office guy, unquestionably a power hire yet a member of the Knicks owner James L. Dolan’s team, with all that suggests and ultimately will mean.
